attributes.action: That every ANIMAL/PET owner from Dog/Bird/ Horse/Cattle must have a vetting certificate approval.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This to ensure the person is licence to handle this type of animal, small or large!
Aswell as proof to provide adquate care for a type of animal.
This stops animals being abused and helps rspca know who is qualified.
Horse riders must take 3 tests for ownership. yard dutys, and knowing all types of care they should undertake. As well as  training/ridden.
Large dog owners must show an dog handler officer that their dog is trained and can be keeped under control.

 A vet must give each animal checks yearly!

rejection.details: Your title should begin with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
